item.title: Chris Mason: Starmer's strongest rebuke yet for Trump
item.description: This past week could mark a turning point in the relationship between the UK prime minister and the US president.

item.title: Police admit overstating Maccabi fan ban evidence
item.description: West Midlands Police also says it would have cost more than Â£5m to police the match without the ban.

item.title: Harry says sacrifices by Nato troops in Afghanistan deserve 'respect' after Trump comments
item.description: The US president's comments have been condemned by international allies, including UK veterans and politicians.

item.title: High stakes but low expectations for Ukraine talks with Russia and US
item.description: Donald Trump is pushing hard for a peace deal - but major issues between Russia and Ukraine are still unresolved, writes Sarah Rainsford.

item.title: Teenagers charged with murder of 15-year-old
item.description: A 15-year-old boy and a 16-year-old boy have been charged after the teenager died in Guildford.
